content.question: The diagram above shows two resonance structures for a molecule of <math alttext="C 6 H 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. The phenomenon shown in the diagram best supports which of the following claims about the bonding in <math alttext="C 6 H 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> Â ?

choices.label: In the <math alttext="C 6 H 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> molecule, all the bonds between the carbon atoms have the same length.

Because of variable bonding between its carbon atoms, <math alttext="C 6 H 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is a good conductor of electricity.

The bonds between carbon atoms in <math alttext="C 6 H 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> are unstable, and the compound decomposes quickly.

The <math alttext="C 6 H 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> molecule contains three single bonds between carbon atoms and three double bonds between carbon atoms.

content.answer: In the <math alttext="C 6 H 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> molecule, all the bonds between the carbon atoms have the same length.

skill.text: 6.C: Support a claim with evidence from representations or models at the particulate level, such as the structure of atoms and/or molecules.
